summary: The most daring moments in the struggle for liberation from colonial rule.
cast: Lauryn Hill|Kati Outinen|Gayatri Chakravorty Spivak|Gaetano Pagano|Tonderai Makoni|Timothy|Robert Mugabe|Robert Jackson|Olle Wijkström|William Tubman|Sören Lagergren|Simão Elias|António de Spínola|Amilcar Cabral|Thomas Sankara
title: Om våld
